Company Name: Al Hammadi Company for Development and Investment (4007)
Description: Al Hammadi Company for Development and Investment (known as: Al Hammadi) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since July 2014. Al Hammadi operates within the Health Care Equipment and Services sector focusing on Health Care Facilities. Al Hammadi is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in November 1985.
